name: EX Drones The Glitched Demensions
description:
EX DRONES THE GLITCHED DEMENSIONS IS A DLC FOR THE ORIGINAL GAME 'EX DRONES'

STORY: WHILE THE CHARACTER OF EX DRONES TRIED TO ELIMINATE  SOME DRONES  SOMETHING STRANGE HAPPENED, HE TELEPORTED TO A DIFFERENT  DEMENSIONS AS A RESULT, THE DEMENSIONS GLITCHED WILL YOU FIND YOUR WAY BACK HOME?
